greeting.message: What do you want? Don't bother me.
greeting.opt1: I just wanted to ask a few questions about this place.

payBeer.message: Pay for my next beer and I'll talk to you.
payBeer.opt2: I'll pass. You can buy one yourself.

talkReady.message: Haha, that's what I'm talking about! Now we can talk.
talkReady.opt1: The beach is safe for now.
talkReady.opt3: What can you tell me about this place?
talkReady.opt4: Do you have any work for me?
talkReady.opt5: I don't have any more questions. Enjoy your drink.

intro.message: My name is Josh. I'm a local fisherman, and my hobby is drinking free beer.
intro.opt1: I see. A drunk and a beggar, then.

placeInfo.message: This is a tavern. Duh. But seriously, it seems like you're new here. This is La Harpar, a fishing village located on Horseshoe Beach.
placeInfo.opt1: Horseshoe Beach? I didn't see any horses on the way here.

workInfo.message: Work? Here? There is always work to do. We've had some animal overpopulation issues on our beach lately. Come back when you've killed 50 enemies on Wave 7 at the Beach.

warning.message: Oi, mate. You don't want to make enemies here. You're a new face, and new faces can disappear overnight in these parts.
warning.opt1: I'm sorry, I got carried away.
warning.opt2: Don't care. You'll trip over those chairs before you could catch me. Bye...

beachName.message: The name comes from the shape of the beach, you donkey. Horseshoe Beach and La Harpar are important trade partners to North Lirold, the capital of this region.
beachName.opt1: What exactly is La Harpar providing?
beachName.opt2: This region? How many regions are there?

tradeInfo.message: We mainly provide various fish and seafood. Lately, we've been overstocked on turtle shells; please go do some work and clear the beach.

regionsInfo.message: There are 4 known regions to us: Southback, Port Stocksmar, Greefic Hill, and Saint Nestroud. La Harpar resides in Port Stocksmar.

unknownRegions.message: Well, beyond Greefic Hill, there is an uncrossable mountain. Some magical force and unpredictable weather conditions make that place impossible to survive.

dangerMountain.message: Yes, and no one who tried ever came back. Then friends or family members tried to search for those people, and they didn't come back either.
dangerMountain.opt1: Interesting. What do you think could be there?
dangerMountain.opt2: I've heard enough. I want to sleep tonight.

mountainRumors.message: Beats me! People who got close said they could hear chants and howls from the forest surrounding the mountain. My feet won't be stepping there anytime soon.

missionCheck.message: No. For now, the coast is clear.
